data.text:
Water level sufficiently increased. Pulse and blood 
pressure are back at expected levels due to resting. 
Maintenance complete.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Water level sufficiently increased. Pulse and blood 
<story>pressure are back at expected levels due to resting. 
<story>Maintenance complete.

data.text:
Thank you very much. 
I will be going now.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Thank you very much. 
<story>I will be going now.

data.text:
Yes. I have concluded that I was merely fatigued due to 
extreme stamina depletion. Currently going through 
successful recovery. Status code 200: OK.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Yes. I have concluded that I was merely fatigued due to 
<story>extreme stamina depletion. Currently going through 
<story>successful recovery. Status code 200: OK.

data.text:
My analysis predicts that I have 7m28s of recovery left 
until all functions are back online. I will continue waiting 
while executing breathing functions until then.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>My analysis predicts that I have 7m28s of recovery left 
<story>until all functions are back online. I will continue waiting 
<story>while executing breathing functions until then.

data.text:
I have a feeling she might continue training after this. 
That can't be good for her.
data.processed:
<story>I have a feeling she might continue training after this. 
<story>That can't be good for her.

data.text:
No. I have scheduled a 2000 meter running task 
after my recovery completes.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>No. I have scheduled a 2000 meter running task 
<story>after my recovery completes.

data.text: Why not?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Why not?

data.text: "Your body isn't yet developed for that distance. That's how accidents happen." I left out the details but I had to tell her that.
data.processed: "Your body isn't yet developed for that distance. That's how accidents happen." I left out the details but I had to tell her that.

data.text: But I need to in order to complete my objective.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: But I need to in order to complete my objective.

data.text: Attaining the Triple Crown title.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Attaining the Triple Crown title.

data.text:
The Triple Crown title goes out to those who win 
the Satsuki Sho, Japan Derby and Kikka Sho. 
They are mainly medium to long distance races.
data.processed:
<story>The Triple Crown title goes out to those who win 
<story>the Satsuki Sho, Japan Derby and Kikka Sho. 
<story>They are mainly medium to long distance races.

data.text: He said he sees great promise in pursuing short distance races with her.
data.name: Experienced Trainer
data.processed: He said he sees great promise in pursuing short distance races with her.

data.text:
Her trainer seems to be aiming for short races, though. 
I wonder if he's aware of her goal of the Triple Crown...
data.processed:
<story>Her trainer seems to be aiming for short races, though. 
<story>I wonder if he's aware of her goal of the Triple Crown...

data.text: My Master... well...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>My Master... well...

data.text: I checked the Twinkle Series' database's records and verified that you have a total of 26 wins to your name under medium and long races.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: I checked the Twinkle Series' database's records and verified that you have a total of 26 wins to your name under medium and long races.

data.text: Thus, I request that you train me to attain the Triple Crown title.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: Thus, I request that you train me to attain the Triple Crown title.

data.text: You know, right...? That you're not well-suited for longer races at all.
data.name: Veteran Trainer
data.processed: You know, right...? That you're not well-suited for longer races at all.

data.text: Correct. My default race length aptitude is that of short distances. However, I'm confident that I can improve my stamina through effort.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: Correct. My default race length aptitude is that of short distances. However, I'm confident that I can improve my stamina through effort.

data.text: You would risk hurting yourself.
data.name: Veteran Trainer
data.processed: You would risk hurting yourself.

data.text: No need to worry. I have a lot of difficult training under my belt since my childhood. My father used to be a trainer. In short: I'm used to it.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: No need to worry. I have a lot of difficult training under my belt since my childhood. My father used to be a trainer. In short: I'm used to it.

data.text: *sigh*
data.name: Veteran Trainer
data.processed: *sigh*

data.text: Listen, you'll be able to make it far with short distance races. So why even bother with such an unrealistic idea?
data.name: Veteran Trainer
data.processed: Listen, you'll be able to make it far with short distance races. So why even bother with such an unrealistic idea?

data.text: ...his status is 'not enthusiastic.'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>...his status is 'not enthusiastic.'

data.text:
I tried querying him with the same request another two 
times after that, but his response has not changed.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I tried querying him with the same request another two 
<story>times after that, but his response has not changed.

data.text: I felt the talent in her speed when I saw her at the mock race. It does feel like a bit of a shame not to utilize it in short races...
data.processed: I felt the talent in her speed when I saw her at the mock race. It does feel like a bit of a shame not to utilize it in short races...

data.text: But I am not changing my ultimate objective of the Triple Crown title.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: But I am not changing my ultimate objective of the Triple Crown title.

data.text:
I have created a flowchart to determine 
my training for medium and long races, 
in order to customize my body's abilities.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I have created a flowchart to determine 
<story>my training for medium and long races, 
<story>in order to customize my body's abilities.

data.text:
I'm working to get first on a medium or long distance 
race to change my Master's response.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I'm working to get first on a medium or long distance 
<story>race to change my Master's response.

data.text:
She's really determined to get the Triple Crown. 
Nevertheless, it's dangerous to do this 
extremely harsh training on her own.

choices.text: Try talking to him one more time―

data.processed:
<story>She's really determined to get the Triple Crown. 
<story>Nevertheless, it's dangerous to do this 
<story>extremely harsh training on her own.

data.text:
Seven and a half minutes passed. 
Physical strength level restored to operable range.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Seven and a half minutes passed. 
<story>Physical strength level restored to operable range.

data.text: I will be going now.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>I will be going now.

data.text:
Whether she was listening or not, she started 
running again the moment she was able to.
data.processed:
<story>Whether she was listening or not, she started 
<story>running again the moment she was able to.

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
(1200 meters passed. Far behind schedule. 
Stepping through flowchart to determine next step... 
More speed required!)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>(1200 meters passed. Far behind schedule. 
<story>Stepping through flowchart to determine next step... 
<story>More speed required!)

data.text: Hng!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Hng!

data.text:
Even from so far away I can tell that what 
she's doing is blatantly too much.
data.processed:
<story>Even from so far away I can tell that what 
<story>she's doing is blatantly too much.

data.text:
"I'm just giving her advice, I'm not coaching her!" 
is the excuse I come up with as I run in her direction.
data.processed:
<story>"I'm just giving her advice, I'm not coaching her!" 
<story>is the excuse I come up with as I run in her direction.

data.text: *pant pant*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

choices.text: Have you looked at your lap time?

data.processed: <story>*pant pant*

data.text: My lap time?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>My lap time?

data.text: What's important for medium and long races is pacing. It's not about going all out, but about keeping up a consistent pace if she wants to improve her times.
data.processed: What's important for medium and long races is pacing. It's not about going all out, but about keeping up a consistent pace if she wants to improve her times.

data.text:
She's good at measuring things in her head. Like when she was 
lost the other day, or when she counted distance or seconds 
just earlier. She might as well make good use of that ability.
data.processed:
<story>She's good at measuring things in her head. Like when she was 
<story>lost the other day, or when she counted distance or seconds 
<story>just earlier. She might as well make good use of that ability.

data.text:
Understood. Parsing new data. Starting measurement 
as soon as physical strength is restored.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Understood. Parsing new data. Starting measurement 
<story>as soon as physical strength is restored.

data.text: But...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

choices.text: There is no need to rush.
There is no need to rush.

data.processed: <story>But...

data.text:
Understood. Changing status to 'calm.' 
Starting 'leasurly training.'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Understood. Changing status to 'calm.' 
<story>Starting 'leasurly training.'

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
(400 meters passed. In line with configured time. 
Updating target to 600 meters. Be aware of my lap time.)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>(400 meters passed. In line with configured time. 
<story>Updating target to 600 meters. Be aware of my lap time.)

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text: (Ensuring stable breathing.)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>(Ensuring stable breathing.)

data.text:
She managed to run that 1600 meters 
at a consistent pace.
data.processed:
<story>She managed to run that 1600 meters 
<story>at a consistent pace.

data.text: New personal best time achieved.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>New personal best time achieved.

data.text:
I was so captivated that I started clapping for her 
without realizing. She still had her usual 
expressionless face, though.
data.processed:
<story>I was so captivated that I started clapping for her 
<story>without realizing. She still had her usual 
<story>expressionless face, though.

data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>...

data.text: Changed status to 'delighted'...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Changed status to 'delighted'...

data.text:
Due to your helpful advice I managed to take a step 
towards attaining the Triple Crown title. 
Thank you very much.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Due to your helpful advice I managed to take a step 
<story>towards attaining the Triple Crown title. 
<story>Thank you very much.

data.text:
Her face still shows no emotion as she says that. 
But I think I saw a smile, albeit for just a moment.
data.processed:
<story>Her face still shows no emotion as she says that. 
<story>But I think I saw a smile, albeit for just a moment.

data.text:
And so begins a daily routine of coming to the 
race track night after night to watch over her 
and make sure she doesn't overexert herself.
data.processed:
<story>And so begins a daily routine of coming to the 
<story>race track night after night to watch over her 
<story>and make sure she doesn't overexert herself.
